description: Fresh and fragrant of blossoms, tart yellow peach and apricot, this off-dry Riesling maintains a crystalline fruit purity that persists throughout Fritz Haag's wines. It's invigorating and irresistably quaffable. The long, melon-rind finish is lip smacking.
title: Fritz Haag 2014 Brauneberger Feinherb Riesling (Mosel)
name: Riesling Trocken

description: Dusty, saffron-spiced earthiness is juxtaposed against intense mango and tangerine fruitiness in this deeply complex wine. It's unctuously sweet, but balanced by a piercing streak of acidity that penetrates through the midpalate. Spry and silken, it finishes on a long lingering whisper of honey and peach.
title: Robert Weil 2014 Kiedrich Gräfenberg Trockenbeerenauslese Riesling (Rheingau)
name: Kiedrich GrÃ¤fenberg Riesling Trocken GG

description: Made from organic grapes, this bright red opens with violet, red-skinned berry and white pepper scents. The juicy palate doles out ripe raspberry, red cherry and star anise notes, with fresh acidity and velvety tannins. Enjoy through 2020.
title: Vite Colte 2016 Rossofuoco  (Barbera d'Asti)
name: Ansisa Barbera d'Alba

description: Made from organic grapes, this bright red opens with violet, red-skinned berry and white pepper scents. The juicy palate doles out ripe raspberry, red cherry and star anise notes, with fresh acidity and velvety tannins. Enjoy through 2020.
title: Vite Colte 2016 Rossofuoco  (Barbera d'Asti)
name: La Luna e i FalÃ² Barbera d'Asti Superiore

description: Made from organic grapes, this bright red opens with violet, red-skinned berry and white pepper scents. The juicy palate doles out ripe raspberry, red cherry and star anise notes, with fresh acidity and velvety tannins. Enjoy through 2020.
title: Vite Colte 2016 Rossofuoco  (Barbera d'Asti)
name: Croere Barbera d'Alba Superiore

description: This opens with black-skinned berry, clove and cooking spice aromas. The straightforward palate shows ripe black cherry, black plum and white pepper notes alongside smooth tannins. Drink soon.
title: Pico Maccario 2016 Lavignone  (Barbera d'Asti)
name: Barbera d'Asti Lavignone

description: This opens with black-skinned berry, clove and cooking spice aromas. The straightforward palate shows ripe black cherry, black plum and white pepper notes alongside smooth tannins. Drink soon.
title: Pico Maccario 2016 Lavignone  (Barbera d'Asti)
name: Barbera d'Asti Superiore Tre Roveri

description: Perfumed on the nose with heady yellow florals and stonefruit, this is one stunner of a Riesling. It's powerfully concentrated on the palate with flavors of honey and sweet peach tinged with lanolin and wax. Penetrating and pure in focus, yet remarkably delicate in texture, it finishes long with layers of crushed-stone minerality.
title: Markus Molitor 2010 Zeltinger Sonnenuhr Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
name: Niedermenniger Herrenberg Riesling Auslese

description: As the wine ages, it shows a soft, toasty and nutty side that adds complexity to the tight fruitiness that remains. It's a wine in transition, still fresh while adding some concentration, broadening the steely texture and giving hints of the serious wine it will be. Drink from 2018.
title: Trimbach 2011 Réserve Riesling (Alsace)
name: Riesling Alsace CuvÃ©e FrÃ©dÃ©ric Emile

description: Exuberant and fresh, this vivacious dry Riesling is anchored in cutting citrus tones of lime, lemon and tangerine. Medium bodied on the palate, it's racy, crystalline style is endlessly quaffable.
title: Wittmann 2015 100 Hills Dry Riesling (Rheinhessen)
name: Aulerde Riesling GG

description: Berry and plum aromas smell a bit burnt, sort of like a burning field. A healthy lively medium-bodied palate delivers smoky oaky roasted berry and plum flavors in front of a lightly spiced finish.
title: Santa Rita 2015 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
name: Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon

description: Berry and plum aromas smell a bit burnt, sort of like a burning field. A healthy lively medium-bodied palate delivers smoky oaky roasted berry and plum flavors in front of a lightly spiced finish.
title: Santa Rita 2015 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
name: Cabernet Sauvignon

description: Cool mint, blueberry and raisin aromas are lush and smooth, but charred oak is roaring loud on the nose of this dry-farmed Syrah. Punchy, short acidity makes the mouthfeel abrupt. Dark chocolate and ripe berry flavors end with hard-spiced blackberry and an everlasting burnt-oak character.
title: Polkura 2014 Secano Dry Farmed Syrah (Marchigue)
name: Lote D Syrah

description: This textbook Barbera opens with classic varietal aromas of dark berry, blue flower and ground spice. The vibrant, full-flavored palate offers juicy black cherry, crushed raspberry and licorice notes alongside fresh acidity and smooth tannins. It's made for sheer drinking pleasure, so enjoy soon.
title: Coppo 2016 L'Avvocata  (Barbera d'Asti)
name: Pomorosso Barbera d'Asti

description: This textbook Barbera opens with classic varietal aromas of dark berry, blue flower and ground spice. The vibrant, full-flavored palate offers juicy black cherry, crushed raspberry and licorice notes alongside fresh acidity and smooth tannins. It's made for sheer drinking pleasure, so enjoy soon.
title: Coppo 2016 L'Avvocata  (Barbera d'Asti)
name: Barbera d'Asti Camp du Rouss

description: This leads with forest floor, blue flower and black-skinned berry aromas while the structured, savory palate offers black cherry, red plum and Asian spice hints. Supple tannins and vibrant acidity provide easygoing support and freshness. Enjoy through 2021.
title: Vite Colte 2015 La Luna e i Falò  (Barbera d'Asti Superiore)
name: La Luna e i FalÃ² Barbera d'Asti Superiore

description: Aged in French oak for 10 months (10% new, 90% second fill), this is a toasty yet balanced selection. Decadent aromas and flavors of buttered brioche, honeydew, baked apple, lemon curd and vanilla cream pie abound. It's rich and mouthfilling in texture, with a lingering sweet-spice flavor. Drink now–2019.
title: De Wetshof 2015 Lesca Chardonnay (Robertson)
name: The Site Chardonnay

description: Aged in French oak for 10 months (10% new, 90% second fill), this is a toasty yet balanced selection. Decadent aromas and flavors of buttered brioche, honeydew, baked apple, lemon curd and vanilla cream pie abound. It's rich and mouthfilling in texture, with a lingering sweet-spice flavor. Drink now–2019.
title: De Wetshof 2015 Lesca Chardonnay (Robertson)
name: Danie de Wet Chardonnay

description: Exotic blueberry and cassis aromas are accented by cardamom and wild-herb scents. This Malbec from Altamira in the Uco Valley is jammy and saturated, but pure, with ripe berry, oak and spice flavors. A juicy fruit-filled finish is packed and tastes like berry compote. Lastly, a delicate herbal note gives this complexity. Drink through 2024.
title: Achaval-Ferrer 2014 Finca Altamira Malbec (Mendoza)
name: Malbec

description: On the oaky side, but silky and long, this is a fine effort. Vanilla, cedar and baking spices, hints of cola and mocha all point to ripe fruit and ample new French oak. Drink now–2025.
title: Palliser Estate 2015 Pinot Noir (Martinborough)
name: Pinot Noir

description: Smooth, savory aromas of prune and blackberry are foresty and lightly herbal. This round-bodied Cab Franc from Tupungato is solid and balanced, with controlled tannins. Oaky flavors of plum, herbal tea and smoke finish savory. Drink through 2023; contains 15% Malbec.
title: El Enemigo 2014 Gran Enemigo Gualtallary Single Vineyard Cabernet Franc (Mendoza)
name: Gran Enemigo Single Vineyard Gualtallary Cabernet Franc

description: Smooth, savory aromas of prune and blackberry are foresty and lightly herbal. This round-bodied Cab Franc from Tupungato is solid and balanced, with controlled tannins. Oaky flavors of plum, herbal tea and smoke finish savory. Drink through 2023; contains 15% Malbec.
title: El Enemigo 2014 Gran Enemigo Gualtallary Single Vineyard Cabernet Franc (Mendoza)
name: Gran Enemigo Single Vineyard El Cepillo Cabernet Franc

description: Lime and lemon zest are joined by aromatic citrus foliage on the nose. The palate replays these sprightly refreshing notes and lets them ripple across the slender palate. This is light, dry and will put a spring in your step with its citrus liveliness.
title: Wolfberger 2016 Riesling (Alsace)
name: Riesling Alsace Grand Cru Steingrubler

description: Whiffs of sun-burnt slate lend contrast to bright nectarine and citrus peel flavors in this clingy, textured Kabinett. Bristling acidity balances delicate swathes of honey- and nectar-like sweetness that linger on the finish. It's delightfully refreshing, with complexity to linger over.
title: Dr. Loosen 2015 Wehlener Sonnenuhr Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
name: Wehlener Sonnenuhr Alte Reben Riesling

description: Whiffs of sun-burnt slate lend contrast to bright nectarine and citrus peel flavors in this clingy, textured Kabinett. Bristling acidity balances delicate swathes of honey- and nectar-like sweetness that linger on the finish. It's delightfully refreshing, with complexity to linger over.
title: Dr. Loosen 2015 Wehlener Sonnenuhr Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
name: Riesling Trocken Blauschiefer

description: With layers upon layers of spicy saffron, peach, honey and caramel to be enjoyed on the nose alone, this heady botrytized Riesling is pure hedonism. The sweet-tart palate is deft and spry yet deeply lusciously penetrating in flavor. Spine-tingling acidity darts through a honeyed, waxy slick that extends the finish endlessly. It's already a heart-stopping wine but will continue to improve for decades to come.
title: Robert Weil 2015 Kiedrich Gräfenberg Trockenbeerenauslese Riesling (Rheingau)
name: Kiedrich GrÃ¤fenberg Riesling Trocken GG

description: Totally herbaceous, this fruity wine has grassy aromas and gooseberry flavors. It's crisp, fresh and ready to drink.
title: Baron Philippe de Rothschild 2012 Mouton Cadet  (Bordeaux Blanc)
name: Les CÃ©pages Sauvignon Blanc

description: Open-grain oak aromas are out front, followed by sweeter scents of marzipan, prune and chocolate. A full, tannic palate is deep and dense, while toasty blackened flavors of cassis and blackberry finish with notes of mocha, chocolate and pepper. This is a bit rough and tannic, so cellaring will help it calm down. Drink through 2023.
title: Pascual Toso 2014 Alta Barrancas Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
name: Selected Vines Cabernet Sauvignon (Barrancas Vineyards)

description: Open-grain oak aromas are out front, followed by sweeter scents of marzipan, prune and chocolate. A full, tannic palate is deep and dense, while toasty blackened flavors of cassis and blackberry finish with notes of mocha, chocolate and pepper. This is a bit rough and tannic, so cellaring will help it calm down. Drink through 2023.
title: Pascual Toso 2014 Alta Barrancas Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
name: Finca Pedregal Single Vineyard Malbec - Cabernet Sauvignon

description: This wine is medium sweet in style with a rich, complex character. It has notes of spice and honey that accent ripe peach and apricot flavors. The richness of the wine comes from it's dense texture. It is ready to drink now, but will also age well.
title: Domaines Schlumberger 2010 Kessler Grand Cru Pinot Gris (Alsace)
name: Pinot Gris Alsace Grand Cru 'KitterlÃ©'

description: Leafy red-berry aromas come with a note of olive. This wine feels lean and searing, with edgy tannins and high acidity. Spicy flavors of herbal plum and tomato finish with a dusting of baking spices.
title: Apaltagua 2015 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Apalta)
name: Signature Cabernet Sauvignon

description: Intense aromas of tropical mango and melon scent this elegant, slightly cream-textured dry Riesling. Sprays of white grapefruit and lime juice brighten the midpalate, extending through a long finish marked by zesty acidity and chalky, dusty mineral tones. Drink now through 2019.
title: Wittmann 2014 Trocken Riesling (Rheinhessen)
name: Kirchspiel Riesling GG

description: Roasted berry and spent coffee aromas blend with leathery notes that suggest animal. This wine feels solid but rough and grabby. Savory plum and berry flavors finish with a note of baking spices.
title: Errazuriz 2015 Max Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Aconcagua Costa)
name: Aconcagua Alto Cabernet Sauvignon

description: Roasted berry and spent coffee aromas blend with leathery notes that suggest animal. This wine feels solid but rough and grabby. Savory plum and berry flavors finish with a note of baking spices.
title: Errazuriz 2015 Max Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Aconcagua Costa)
name: Max Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon

description: Roasted berry and spent coffee aromas blend with leathery notes that suggest animal. This wine feels solid but rough and grabby. Savory plum and berry flavors finish with a note of baking spices.
title: Errazuriz 2015 Max Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Aconcagua Costa)
name: Estate Cabernet Sauvignon

description: Oceanic aromas of grass, scallion, baby garlic and lime reflect cool-coast origins. A slick, juicy mouthfeel is minerally, while this offers flavors of nettle, lime, passion fruit and green onion. A long, stony finish leans towards green flavors.
title: Errazuriz 2015 Sauvignon Blanc (Aconcagua Costa)
name: Max Reserva Sauvignon Blanc

description: This is light bodied and crisp, its bright cherry fruit accented by leafy, slightly green notes. Clean and vibrant, it's the sort of Pinot that should work well with salmon.
title: Villa Maria 2015 Private Bin Pinot Noir (Marlborough)
name: Cellar Selection Pinot Noir

description: A deep, dark Syrah with cola, spice, pepper, cedar and olive notes to go with more familiar blackberry and mocha. The palate is deep and pure, with juicy acidity pushing herbal berry and layered spice flavors. Has good flow and feel, and overall it strikes the right chords.
title: Errazuriz 2008 Single Vineyard Syrah (Aconcagua Valley)
name: La Cumbre Syrah

description: Aromas of cherry, cassis, vanilla and mild spice are fruity, clean and inviting. A concentrated, forward palate holds flavors of black fruits, cassis and chocolate. A ripe, solid finish fades away slowly and smoothly. Drink through 2021.
title: Santa Helena 2013 Gran Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
name: Gran Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (SelecciÃ³n del Directorio)

description: A jumbled mix of aromas includes notes of rubber, berry fruits, plum, grass, fennel and oak. In the mouth, this is full and blocky. Rubbery flavors of plum and berry finish salty, savory and spicy, with unintegrated oak that stands out.
title: Ritual 2015 Monster Block Pinot Noir (Casablanca Valley)
name: Pinot Noir

description: Stone flint and smoke join a lovely combination of superripe orange and juicy mandarin. The palate focuses even more on these luscious juicy citrus flavors. It gets direction from gentle but definite lemon freshness. With a little air, an earthier aspect grounds this beautifully and gives a three-dimensional picture of aroma, flavor and texture with immense and intense length.
title: Pichler-Krutzler 2015 Kellerberg Riesling (Wachau)
name: Loibenberg Riesling

description: Spicy grassy aromas of catmint are matched by unusual clove scents. A tough rubbery palate is where you'll find spicy blackberry and green-herb flavors. Pulling tannins are the driving force on this wine's choppy clipped finish.
title: Santa Rita 2015 Reserva Syrah (Maipo Valley)
name: Syrah

description: Pear laced with subtle notes of smoke hints at a taut palate. The dryness and discipline of the poised flavors nonetheless allow the ripe, luscious pear fruit to glow and shine. Mouthfeel and texture are reminiscent of pear peel and bitter almond, and echo long after the last sip.
title: Trimbach 2013 Réserve Pinot Gris (Alsace)
name: Pinot Gris Alsace RÃ©serve Personnelle

description: This new Chardonnay from chalky soils smells of lanolin and waxy orange. On the palate, this shows some minerality but mostly it's bulky and citric. Briny stone-fruit flavors finish flat.
title: Trapiche 2016 Perfiles Calcareo Chardonnay (Mendoza)
name: Perfiles Calcareo Chardonnay

description: Familiar Cab Franc aromas of dry spice, green herbs, fennel and pepperoni feed into a narrow palate that's high in acidity and drawing. Spiky tomato, plum, herb and pepper flavors finish dry and pulling, with a saucy aftertaste.
title: Andeluna 2013 Pasionado Cabernet Franc (Tupungato)
name: Pasionado Cabernet Franc

description: High-toned energy is the persistent theme of this coastal Syrah. The nose is jumpy and wild, with leather, coffee and tarry notes along with foxy berry fruit. A juicy, crisp palate is high in acid, ringing with peppery currant and plum flavors. Toasty, spicy oak leads a ripped, bold finish. Drink through 2023.
title: Errazuriz 2015 Syrah (Aconcagua Costa)
name: La Cumbre Syrah

description: High-toned energy is the persistent theme of this coastal Syrah. The nose is jumpy and wild, with leather, coffee and tarry notes along with foxy berry fruit. A juicy, crisp palate is high in acid, ringing with peppery currant and plum flavors. Toasty, spicy oak leads a ripped, bold finish. Drink through 2023.
title: Errazuriz 2015 Syrah (Aconcagua Costa)
name: Max Reserva Syrah

description: This vintage of Cloudy Bay boasts aromas of struck flint and white grapefruit, then adds hints of pineapple and green herbs on the long, austere finish.
title: Cloudy Bay 2016 Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
name: Te Koko Sauvignon Blanc

description: Scents of crushed tomato stalk and green onion make a big impression upfront, but they're balanced by stone fruit and pineapple flavors. This is rich and ripe in the mouth, showing great power and persistence on the finish. Drink now.
title: Saint Clair 2015 Pioneer Block 20 Dillons Point Cash Block Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
name: Barrique Sauvignon Blanc

description: Scents of crushed tomato stalk and green onion make a big impression upfront, but they're balanced by stone fruit and pineapple flavors. This is rich and ripe in the mouth, showing great power and persistence on the finish. Drink now.
title: Saint Clair 2015 Pioneer Block 20 Dillons Point Cash Block Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
name: Wairau Reserve Sauvignon Blanc

description: Leathery plum and berry aromas are also jammy and floral on this full and round wine. Roasted berry flavors come with a bacon-like note, delivering similar flavors on the finish.
title: Cono Sur 2015 Bicicleta Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Valley)
name: Bicicleta Cabernet Sauvignon

description: A dense, full-bodied red, this opens with aromas of blackberry jam, vanilla, oak and a whiff of herbs. The robust palate delivers fleshy black cherry, cracked black pepper, licorice and tobacco alongside velvety tannins. You'll also the notice the heat of evident alcohol, especially on the close, which throws it somewhat off-balance.
title: Tua Rita 2012 Per Sempre Syrah (Toscana)
name: Per Sempre Syrah Toscana

description: The slightest touch of flinty reduction clings to the nose. Underneath, the crisp, slender palate is dominated by appetizing notes of ripe lemon. A tiny bit of spritz makes the slender body seem almost weightless, but all that lovely lemon fruit fills mouth and nose. The finish is featherlight and refreshing.
title: Tement 2016 Steirische Klassik Sauvignon Blanc (Südsteiermark)
name: Zieregg Sauvignon Blanc

description: This oaky number offers enough meaty fruit to keep itself on an even keel. Gritty berry and sawdust aromas lead to a full-bodied, resiny palate. Woody, drying flavors rest heavily atop a core of medicinal, herbal berry fruit. It's ripe and resiny on the finish, which is consistent with what came beforehand.
title: Pascual Toso 2013 Estate Bottled Malbec (Mendoza)
name: Alta Malbec (Barrancas Vineyards)

description: This sprightly-sweet Riesling fills the glass with an opulent floral perfume of rose petals and orange blossoms. It's profoundly aromatic, yet remarkably elegant, balanced by layers of crisp honeydew and peach flavors. A zesty strike of acidity freshens the finish.
title: Robert Weil 2013 Spätlese Tradition Riesling (Rheingau)
name: Kiedrich GrÃ¤fenberg Riesling Trocken GG

description: Winemaker: Marc Kent. The bouquet of this attractive Syrah offers a pleasant interplay between floral tones of crushed violet and iris and fruity notes of ripe blackberry and blueberry. The medium-weight palate is plush and seductive, with a texture like crushed velvet and brambly, spice-accented flavors of black cherry and forest berry. Hints of bittersweet chocolate shavings and subtle char grace the elegant finish. Cellaring will encourage additional depth and complexity; drink 2020–2025.
title: Boekenhoutskloof 2014 Cape Winemakers Guild Auction Reserve Syrah (Swartland)
name: Syrah

description: This wine is made to be drunk young when it is still in the first flush of its fruitiness. Black plum and blackberry flavors are fleshed out with soft tannins. The aftertaste is fresh with bright acidity. Drink now.
title: Lionel Osmin & Cie 2014 La Réserve Malbec (Vin de France)
name: Cahors Malbec

description: Menzies is the name of Yalumba's Coonawarra estate, which is almost entirely devoted to Cabernet Sauvignon. Like most of the Yalumba wines, the oak levels have been pared back in recent vintages, allowing this wine's cassis fruit to to shine. Hints of tobacco, bay leaf and sage bring complexity, while the tannins are fine, adding a softly dusty feel to the long finish.
title: Yalumba 2013 The Cigar Menzies Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Coonawarra)
name: The Signature Cabernet Sauvignon - Shiraz

description: Moderately ripe white-fruit aromas of peach and melon come with a hint of buttery oak. This feels lean and citric, with more acid than body. A shot of citric flavor gives way to yeasty dryness, while the finish is juicy but bitter around the edges.
title: Errazuriz 2015 Chardonnay (Aconcagua Costa)
name: Max Reserva Chardonnay

description: Mildly stewed berry aromas come with loud oak and a strong hint of green herbs. This Cab Franc feels syrupy and chunky, with baked flavors of berry fruits and oaky chocolate. That theme of oak and chocolate carries over to the finish.
title: Kaiken 2015 Obertura Cabernet Franc (Mendoza)
name: Obertura Cabernet Franc

description: This Pinot takes a few minutes to open up, yet when it does it smells like dusting polish and Dr. Pepper. The palate is more subtle with a good lick of acidity and chewy tannins finishing on dark cherry fruit. It's not the most typical example of this region or grape variety, but it has its charms nonetheless.
title: Kim Crawford 2015 Small Parcels Rise & Shine Pinot Noir (Central Otago)
name: Pinot Noir

description: Max Reserva is the easiest, most fruity of the Errazuriz Chardonnay lineup for 2014. Aromas of vanilla wafer, barrel toast, smoke and white fruits announce a smooth but simple palate. Peach, melon and toasty oak are the key flavors, while this finishes a touch salty.
title: Errazuriz 2014 Max Reserva Chardonnay (Aconcagua Costa)
name: Las Pizarras Chardonnay

description: Max Reserva is the easiest, most fruity of the Errazuriz Chardonnay lineup for 2014. Aromas of vanilla wafer, barrel toast, smoke and white fruits announce a smooth but simple palate. Peach, melon and toasty oak are the key flavors, while this finishes a touch salty.
title: Errazuriz 2014 Max Reserva Chardonnay (Aconcagua Costa)
name: Aconcagua Costa Chardonnay

description: Plump tropical fruit aromas show on the nose. A fruity but not complex palate deals short melon and tropical-fruit flavors prior to a briny finish.
title: Domaine Bousquet 2017 Cameleon Made With Organic Grapes Chardonnay (Tupungato)
name: Reserve Chardonnay

description: As the entry-level Chardonnay from one of Margaret River's most highly lauded producers, this has a creamy opulence to it, with notes of buttercups, lemon drops and toasty oak. The palate is of medium weight, with a viscous texture and a good lick of acidity to keep things fresh, but the oak is a little flashy, particularly on the finish.
title: Vasse Felix 2016 Filius Chardonnay (Margaret River)
name: Heytesbury Chardonnay

description: As the entry-level Chardonnay from one of Margaret River's most highly lauded producers, this has a creamy opulence to it, with notes of buttercups, lemon drops and toasty oak. The palate is of medium weight, with a viscous texture and a good lick of acidity to keep things fresh, but the oak is a little flashy, particularly on the finish.
title: Vasse Felix 2016 Filius Chardonnay (Margaret River)
name: Chardonnay

description: Chunky, meaty, saucy plum and berry aromas are green and gritty. This is solid feeling on first blush, but then it collapses and turns clampy and tannic. Minimal berry and cassis flavors battle with herbal, green notes in front of a chubby, imprecise finish.
title: Siegel 2013 Special Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
name: Special Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon

description: Bold, ripe black-cherry and berry flavors pulsate from the core of this voluptuous Pinot Noir. It's a densely concentrated, full-bodied wine but neatly integrated, nuanced by subtle shades of spice, dark toast and bramble. Crisp cranberry acidity freshens the finish. Drink now through 2030.
title: August Kesseler 2013 Cuvée Max Trocken Pinot Noir (Rheingau)
name: Pinot Noir

description: Planeta's fresh rosé (made with Syrah) shows attractive berry, citrus, herb and sweet almond-paste notes.
title: Planeta 2011 Rosé Syrah (Sicilia)
name: Maroccoli Syrah

description: While this Cab may be a touch soupy and heavy on the nose, aromas of coffee grounds and berry fruits are good. A full, blocky palate features cheek-rubbing tannins, while this tastes of coffee, chocolate and herbal berry fruits. For everyday purposes, this makes the grade.
title: Trivento 2014 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
name: Tribu Cabernet Sauvignon

description: Aromas of blue flowers, black-skinned fruit and whiffs of mocha lead the nose on this structured Sangiovese. The full-bodied palate delivers mature plum, fleshy black cherry, clove and Mediterranean herb alongside velvety tannins. It closes on a note of mint chocolate.
title: Petra 2011 Alto Sangiovese (Toscana)
name: Alto Sangiovese

description: How can such lightness, such supple slenderness, come with such full flavor? Visions of swirling citrus are made manifest here. Mandarin, kumquat, tangerine: they all dance and flit around a central seam of freshness. Lovely and almost irresistible now, but sure to advance most gracefully.
title: Schloss Gobelsburg 2015 Riesling (Kamptal)
name: Riesling Tradition

description: Winemaker: Marc Kent. Though perhaps better known for his classic Boekenhoutskloof Syrah or Semillon, do NOT underestimate the power and beauty of Marc Kent's Cabernet. This is a real stunner, packed full of well-balanced and -composed power that suggests this is a wine indented for the long haul. It's loaded with ripe, dense black-fruit aromas and flavors, expressed in waves of black plum, berry and cherry that are accented by pleasant hints of green pepper, licorice root and charred bark. It's bold and firmly structured on the palate, with robust tannins that linger long on the chewy, cigar-box spiced finish. Drink 2022–2028.
title: Boekenhoutskloof 2015 Cape Winemakers Guild Auction Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Franschhoek)
name: Cabernet Sauvignon

description: Winemaker: Andries Burger. Always a stunner, the 2016 Wagon Trail delivers impeccable balance, freshness and minerality that can easily translate in the wine being mistaken for one from another iconic Old World Chardonnay region, and probably at about five times the price. It's decadently ripe and toasty, with present yet refined notes of baked apple, lemon meringue and toasted hazelnut that leave you begging for more. The rich mouthfeel is immediately countered by superb, bright acidity and stony minerality before veering back into notes of toasted brioche and spiced citrus peel on the endless finish. A true stunner that will age well through 2028.
title: Paul Cluver 2016 Cape Winemakers Guild The Wagon Trail Chardonnay (Elgin)
name: Chardonnay

description: Winemaker: Marc Kent. A blend of Syrah from Kent's Porseleinberg's Vineyard and an old Stellenbosch vineyard, this is a gripping and young Syrah, begging for some time to mature. Initially, aromas of church incense, fruit cake, licorice and fynbos lead the bouquet, with ripe black cherry and berry fruit at the core. It's rich and robust, with aggressive tannins that lend a gripping texture to the mouthfeel and a bittersweet cocoa astringency to the finish, alongside notes of char and black olive. Drink 2021–2026.
title: Boekenhoutskloof 2015 Cape Winemakers Guild Auction Reserve Syrah (Coastal Region)
name: Syrah

description: Fresh, primary blackberry and cherry flavors are streaked by a fresh herbal tinge in this especially food friendly Pinot Noir. Soft tannins and a rounded mouthfeel make it approachable now through 2020.
title: August Kesseler 2014 N Qualitätswein Pinot Noir (Pfalz)
name: CuvÃ©e Max Pinot Noir

description: A hint of smoke and a touch of earth precede the fresh lemon notes of the nose. The dry palate, with its vivid impression of very pure, bright and incisive lemon freshness, still seems tightly wound. There is something brooding and alive about this—it can be felt below the surface, disquieting but promising. This has barely started on its journey and will take a while to develop fully but it's all already there, dormant and ready to unfurl with a little more bottle age. The pure, long and intense finish is a delicious promise. Drink 2017–2037.
title: Hugel 2011 Grossi Laüe Riesling (Alsace)
name: Riesling Grossi LaÃ¼e

description: Dusty spice and resiny oak aromas sit on top of pedestrian apple, pear and melon notes. This Chardonnay from a complicated, rainy vintage feels round and chunky, and sort of oily. Oaky peach flavors finish with little but barrel spice.
title: Errazuriz 2016 Max Reserva Chardonnay (Aconcagua Costa)
name: Las Pizarras Chardonnay

description: Dusty spice and resiny oak aromas sit on top of pedestrian apple, pear and melon notes. This Chardonnay from a complicated, rainy vintage feels round and chunky, and sort of oily. Oaky peach flavors finish with little but barrel spice.
title: Errazuriz 2016 Max Reserva Chardonnay (Aconcagua Costa)
name: Estate Chardonnay

description: Dusty spice and resiny oak aromas sit on top of pedestrian apple, pear and melon notes. This Chardonnay from a complicated, rainy vintage feels round and chunky, and sort of oily. Oaky peach flavors finish with little but barrel spice.
title: Errazuriz 2016 Max Reserva Chardonnay (Aconcagua Costa)
name: Max Reserva Chardonnay

description: This is VM's big single-vineyard Pinot, but it's already very approachable. Savory overtones of damp earth, outline modest pie-cherry notes that seem somewhat delicate. Enjoy this medium-bodied wine over the next few years for its silky texture.
title: Villa Maria 2013 Taylor's Pass Vineyard Pinot Noir (Marlborough)
name: Seddon Vineyard Pinot Noir

description: Dark woody mossy aromas are heavy, ripe and suggest raisin and prune. This Syrah is stacked and dense on the palate, with hard tannins that pinch. Blackened burnt flavors of blackberry, toast, baking spices, campfire and bacon finish with overt, dominating oak.
title: Pascual Toso 2014 Alta Barrancas Vineyards Syrah (Mendoza)
name: Barrancas Vineyards Alta Syrah

description: Trapiche is doing all sorts of experiments with terroirs and soils, and this Malbec is from vineyards planted on top of clay. On the nose, it's oaky, with notes of clove, mint and barrel spice accenting black-fruit scents. A full chewy palate deals spicy oaky minty blackberry flavors in front of a chocolaty finish with wood spice and minty berry notes. Drink through 2019.
title: Trapiche 2015 Perfiles Textura Fina Malbec (Mendoza)
name: Terroir Series Coletto Malbec

description: Trapiche is doing all sorts of experiments with terroirs and soils, and this Malbec is from vineyards planted on top of clay. On the nose, it's oaky, with notes of clove, mint and barrel spice accenting black-fruit scents. A full chewy palate deals spicy oaky minty blackberry flavors in front of a chocolaty finish with wood spice and minty berry notes. Drink through 2019.
title: Trapiche 2015 Perfiles Textura Fina Malbec (Mendoza)
name: Terroir Series Ambrosia Malbec

description: Pure citrus zest rises from the glass: lovely, ripe lemon and zesty lime. The palate reinforces these flavors in a rapier-like fashion, with drive and energy in a very linear energetic way. This seem like an elixir or a tonic full of vim, all informed by a central dynamic freshness. This has barely blossomed but promises much future pleasure. This genie should be contained in its bottle for a while longer before letting it loose. It's something to look forward to. Drink 2020–2035.
title: Trimbach 2013 Réserve Riesling (Alsace)
name: Riesling Alsace Grand Cru 'Geisberg'

description: Pure citrus zest rises from the glass: lovely, ripe lemon and zesty lime. The palate reinforces these flavors in a rapier-like fashion, with drive and energy in a very linear energetic way. This seem like an elixir or a tonic full of vim, all informed by a central dynamic freshness. This has barely blossomed but promises much future pleasure. This genie should be contained in its bottle for a while longer before letting it loose. It's something to look forward to. Drink 2020–2035.
title: Trimbach 2013 Réserve Riesling (Alsace)
name: Clos Sainte Hune Riesling Alsace

description: The nose is fresh but shows complete restraint. The palate gently draws pure Comice pear fruit, its ripeness tempered with ample clean freshness. A streamlined precise slenderness characterizes this bone-dry, restrained and therefore utterly elegant Pinot Gris. It's a class act to drink from now through 2030.
title: Trimbach 2015 Réserve Pinot Gris (Alsace)
name: Pinot Gris Alsace RÃ©serve Personnelle

description: This top-shelf Cabernet never fails, and in this warm year the wine is dark in color, with lush yet precise aromas of graphite, fresh blackberry, baking spices and forest floor. A deep palate is just racy enough, while spicy flavors of cassis include integrated herbal notes. Closing flavors of coffee and chocolate, along with soft tannins, make this approachable now and best through 2022.
title: Santa Rita 2012 Casa Real Estate Bottled Old Vines Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
name: Casa Real Cabernet Sauvignon

description: Honest Pinot Noir aromas of spicy, leafy cherry and plum are good but common. This feels just about right, albeit a touch full and creamy. Flavors of cola, cherry and chocolate are ripe, moderately oaked and finish creamy, with flavors of vanilla, savory spices and rooty sweetness.
title: Salentein 2014 Reserve Pinot Noir (Uco Valley)
name: Reserve Pinot Noir

description: After an initial wave of briny rubbery aromas, this turns towards lively raspberry scents topped by toasty oak. Fresh and punchy in the mouth, with elegance, this tastes of red raspberry and herbal plum. A lightly salty finish with tomato and plum flavors is fresh and lasting.
title: Errazuriz 2015 Pinot Noir (Aconcagua Valley)
name: Las Pizarras Pinot Noir

description: Ripe berry, raisin, prune, chocolate and cool earth aromas make for a fine nose. This is full and rich, a bit chunky, but not too heavy. Flavors of coconut are backed by blackberry fruit; on the finish, that oaky coconut character transitions to vanilla. Drink through 2022.
title: Errazuriz 2013 La Cumbre Syrah (Aconcagua Valley)
name: La Cumbre Syrah

description: Heavily oaked up front, this smells of sweet spices, lactic berry fruits and hickory. The palate is fairly blocky and grabby, with resiny wood notes. Flavors of hickory and lactic berry match the nose on this oaky rendition of Malbec.
title: Kaiken 2014 Reserva Malbec (Mendoza)
name: Mai The First A.Montes Malbec

description: A wonderfully aromatic wine that's bone dry, fresh and textured. A steely edge gives a mineral, tight character that emphasizes the youth of the wine. With a dominance of orange and lemon zest, plus juicy acidity, the wine does need a year or two; drink after 2016.
title: Trimbach 2012 Riesling (Alsace)
name: Riesling Alsace Grand Cru 'Geisberg'

description: A wonderfully aromatic wine that's bone dry, fresh and textured. A steely edge gives a mineral, tight character that emphasizes the youth of the wine. With a dominance of orange and lemon zest, plus juicy acidity, the wine does need a year or two; drink after 2016.
title: Trimbach 2012 Riesling (Alsace)
name: Clos Sainte Hune Riesling Alsace

description: Briary berry aromas come with notes of mint and oak-based vanilla scents. Earthy berry, prune and licorice flavors finish with rooty spice and mild herbal notes.
title: Caliterra 2012 Tributo Single Vineyard Syrah (Colchagua Valley)
name: Tributo Syrah

description: This strange, floral-smelling Chard seems more like Gewürztraminer. It's creamy and cloying in the mouth, with spicy, sweet flavors of anise and lychee. It's particular and unique, but not very good.
title: Enate 2012 234 Chardonnay (Somontano)
name: Chardonnay Uno

description: Slight notes of yellow pear appear gently on the nose and become fully-fledged on the soft easy fruit-driven palate. A dollop of residual sweetness helps these fruity flavors along. An edge of bitter zestiness and freshness contains the fruit. This finishes off dry but fresh.
title: Wolfberger 2016 Pinot Gris (Alsace)
name: Riesling - Muscat - Pinot Gris Alsace (W)

description: Maple and clove aromas scream of oak, and not toasty, spicy oak. Following suit, this is creamy and less than fluent on the palate. Furthermore, this tastes of clove and creamy oak more than actual fruit.
title: MontGras 2015 Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
name: Antu Cabernet Sauvignon

description: An earthy touch of freshly turned soil clings to the pure apple note on the nose. On the absolutely dry palate, however, a beautifully lithe, serene but all-encompassing cloud of lemon freshness just steals the show. It pervades and informs nose, palate and mind. Its luminosity and vivacious freshness just soars and sings. Yes, this is uncompromising. You have to like freshness, acidity and unflinching honesty to be a fan of this, but if you are, this is a ticket to vinous heaven. Wow. This is a real experience and a celebration of site and variety. Hoard this if you can. Gorgeous and fresh now, but far too young. Drink 2022–2040.
title: Trimbach 2014 Schlossberg Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
name: Riesling Alsace Grand Cru 'Schlossberg'

description: Muddy plum and berry aromas lead to a sharp, rugged palate. Tart plum and pie cherry flavors end raw, rough and bitter.
title: Callia 2014 Alta Malbec (Tulum Valley)
name: Esperado Shiraz - Malbec

description: This soft, warm version of Malbec has light tannins and attractive acidity. Fruity and crisp with bright red berry fruit, it will be ready to drink from 2018.
title: Lionel Osmin & Cie 2015 La Réserve Malbec (Vin de France)
name: La RÃ©serve Malbec

description: Gritty, oily, nutty aromas lead to a tight citric palate. Salty narrow flavors of passion fruit and grapefruit finish steady and briny. Overall, this is basic in every way.
title: Veramonte 2016 Sauvignon Blanc (Casablanca Valley)
name: Sauvignon Blanc Organic

description: Given the paucity of quality Viognier (or any Viognier) for under $15, this is a notable achievement. Musky, melony and spicy, it marries ample weight and breadth with just enough life-giving acidity. Drink now.
title: Yalumba 2016 The Y Series Viognier (South Australia)
name: The Y Series Shiraz - Viognier

description: Given the paucity of quality Viognier (or any Viognier) for under $15, this is a notable achievement. Musky, melony and spicy, it marries ample weight and breadth with just enough life-giving acidity. Drink now.
title: Yalumba 2016 The Y Series Viognier (South Australia)
name: Viognier (Samuel's Garden Collection)

description: Foxy berry and currant flavors carry a note of wet dog fur. This is clampy and saucy feeling on the palate, with herbal flavors of plum, berry and tomato sauce. A hollow finish tastes slightly green.
title: Santa Rita 2016 120 Reserva Especial Merlot (Central Valley)
name: Merlot

description: A hard coating of woodspice sits atop herbal plum and berry aromas. This feels tough and nearly impermeable. Spicy, briary plum flavors are lean and taste woody on a dry, tannic finish.
title: Salentein 2016 Portillo Estate Bottled Cabernet Sauvignon (Valle de Uco)
name: Portillo Cabernet Sauvignon

description: Touches of crushed purple violets add depth and interest to the brambly black berry and raspberry core of this lush wine. Hints of menthol and charred oak dance in the background, with flavors of cherry skin and blackberry taking centerstage on the solidly structured palate.
title: Fortant 2016 Coast Select Cabernet Sauvignon (Pays d'Oc)
name: Cabernet Sauvignon

description: Ripe blackberry aromas are welcoming and clean. This features a flush palate that hollows out while delivering generic but fresh black-fruit flavors. A tasty, fresh finish makes this good for everyday drinking.
title: Trivento 2014 Reserve Malbec (Mendoza)
name: Golden Reserve Malbec

description: Pungent stony citrus aromas include a distinct whiff of passion fruit. This feels tight, crisp and elegant on the palate, while slightly salty citrus flavors suggest grapefruit and sea brine. A briny finish retains snap and freshness.
title: Errazuriz 2016 Max Reserva Sauvignon Blanc (Aconcagua Costa)
name: Max Reserva Sauvignon Blanc

description: Creamy aromas of milk chocolate and berry fruits set up a moderately gripping palate. Nonspecific berry and clove flavors finish plump and chewy, with a strong oak character on the close.
title: Santa Rita 2016 120 Reserva Especial Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Valley)
name: Medalla Real (Gran Reserva) Cabernet Sauvignon

description: Creamy aromas of milk chocolate and berry fruits set up a moderately gripping palate. Nonspecific berry and clove flavors finish plump and chewy, with a strong oak character on the close.
title: Santa Rita 2016 120 Reserva Especial Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Valley)
name: Reserva Especial Cabernet Sauvignon

description: This wine's baking spice, vanilla and black-skinned berry aromas drift out of the glass. The straightforward palate offers mature black cherry, clove and tobacco flavors while rounded tannins lend easygoing support. Drink soon.
title: Pico Maccario 2015 Tre Roveri  (Barbera d'Asti)
name: Barbera d'Asti Superiore Tre Roveri

description: This wine's baking spice, vanilla and black-skinned berry aromas drift out of the glass. The straightforward palate offers mature black cherry, clove and tobacco flavors while rounded tannins lend easygoing support. Drink soon.
title: Pico Maccario 2015 Tre Roveri  (Barbera d'Asti)
name: Barbera d'Asti Superiore Epico

description: No, this is not a misprint. This $6 Chardonnay is a quaffer's dream. Aromas of apple and pear are clean and pleasant. On the palate, this feels round and balanced. Slightly salty apple flavors are steady on the finish.
title: Santa Rita 2016 120 Reserva Especial Chardonnay (Central Valley)
name: Reserva Chardonnay

description: This Cabernet Sauvignon from Penedès is on the money. A smooth, creamy nose of vanilla, oak and berry aromas leads to a ripe, saturated palate with a meaty texture. Flavors of black fruits, wild herbs, licorice and spice are long, savory and chocolaty on a finish that lasts three minutes. Drink from 2019–2030.
title: Torres 2012 Mas la Plana Cabernet Sauvignon (Penedès)
name: Mas La Plana Cabernet Sauvignon

description: Smoky pear and flinty citrus set the tone for this slender, fresh and very sprightly wine. The ultralight body delivers lemony refreshment and finishes with clean zip. Drink soon.
title: Gross 2014 Ratsch Sauvignon Blanc (Südsteiermark)
name: Steirische Klassik Sauvignon Blanc

description: Harsh, grassy, weedy berry aromas mix with a heavy amount of clove. In the mouth, this is screechy and way off balance. A clove-heavy flavor profile is oaky and messy on Kaiken's entry-level Malbec.
title: Kaiken 2016 Reserva Malbec (Mendoza)
name: Mai The First A.Montes Malbec

description: This is a smooth, ripe style of Sauvignon Blanc. It hints at mango and pineapple as well as more crisply citrus fruit and shows an herbal, green fruit character on the finish. Drink now.
title: Lionel Osmin & Cie 2016 La Réserve Sauvignon Blanc (Vin de France)
name: Domaine San de Guilhem Colombard - Sauvignon Blanc Gascogne Blanc Sec

description: Yalumba's efforts with Viognier have trickled all the way down into a $10 version under the Oxford Landing label. Fresh herbs, apple and citrus mark the nose, while the palate delivers mandarin and melon fruit along with Viognier's hallmark oily texture. Drink now.
title: Oxford Landing 2015 Viognier (South Australia)
name: Viognier
